hero.title: Experience the Magic of Morocco at FIFA World Cup 2030
hero.subtitle: Join us for an unforgettable celebration of football, culture, and hospitality across Morocco, Spain, and Portugal.

morocco.title: Morocco
morocco.description: Experience the warm hospitality, rich culture, and stunning landscapes of Morocco, featuring world-class stadiums in vibrant cities from Casablanca to Marrakech.

spain.title: Spain
spain.description: From Madrid to Barcelona, Spain offers iconic football venues with a passionate fan base and a country steeped in footballing tradition and success.

portugal.title: Portugal
portugal.description: Portugal combines beautiful coastal cities with modern stadiums, offering visitors a blend of rich history and contemporary football venues.
